channel.title: Need help with error!

error:

item.title: Need help with error!
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

You could put this init

{ if(actionTimer == 0){ { actionTimer = 100; stillgfx(401, absY, absX); for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 5); setAnimation(1914); stillgfx(465, absX, absY); txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } }
thats my veng

item.title: Need help with error!
item.description:
@26593 wrote:

here is my whole emote case now:

[code]case 170: // laugh emote
{
if (playerLevel[6] >= 94 && CanVen == true)
{
if (Vengeance == true)
{
sendMessage(“You already have Vengeance casted!”);
}
else if (Vengeance != true)
{
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
startAnimation(811);
stillgfx(437, absY, absX);
Vengeance = true;
VengeanceTimer = 360;
VenTimer = 120;
}
else if(playerLevel[6] < 94)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 94 to cast Vengeance!”);
}
}
}

			break;[/code]

it still doesnt do anything…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 05:02:38 AM[/size][hr]maybe i should leave the CanVen out coz maybe i cant use it… lol… ima try it now…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 05:06:20 AM[/size][hr]IT WORKS!@@@@@@@@@@ YAYAAAAAAYAYAYAY!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 05:11:29 AM[/size][hr]no it doesnt work,…
